name: Bus Driver World Simulator
description:
Start the engine, press the pedal and go!!
the New Bus World Driving game will give you the opportunity to try yourself as a bus driver.
Create your own passenger transportation company and become the largest bus Corporation in the world.
Feel like the life of the bus drivers!
Watch out for the traffic - don’t hit any cars or people crossing.
Drive your bus through the city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations.

Features:
• Realistic controls (tilt, button and virtual steering wheel)
• Challenging driving & parking mission for the real bus driver
• Modern buses
• High quality graphics
• Realistic animated Passengers
• Manage your company, hire drivers
• Detailed Interiors

We guarantee it’s the best bus simulator game in the store at the moment and one of the best driving games.
Get Bus Driver World now for FREE and start your career.Many passengers are waiting for you!!!
